name: Parti-Kill
description:
***this game has unfinished features***

In this simplistic game, you must defend your tower from getting hit from those persistent enemies! This is difficult but you will get upgrades along the way to aid you in protecting you tower!

How To Play:

Left click the enemies before they reach your tower.

At the end of each round you will get a choice between three upgrades to improve your tower

Survive as many waves as you can!

Credits and Attributions:

The following music was used for this media project:

Music: Space Jazz by Kevin MacLeod
